LanguageData.AJO_SpectagoTea.stages.0.label: initial-hidden
LanguageData.AJO_SpectagoTea.stages.1.label: warm
LanguageData.AJO_SpectagoTea.stages.1.description: It's nice to have a warm cuppa.
LanguageData.AJO_SpectagoTea.stages.2.label: relaxed
LanguageData.AJO_SpectagoTea.stages.2.description: I feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.3.des: I read a book in a decent library.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.4.des: I read a book in a nice library.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.5.des: I had a great time reading in an impressive library.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.6.des: I had a great time reading in a very impressive library.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.7.des: I had a great time reading in an extremely impressive library. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.8.des: I had a great time reading in an unbelievably impressive library. I could stay there forever.
LanguageData.AJO_ReadInImpressiveLibrary.stages.9.des: I had a great time reading in a wonderful library. I could stay there forever.
